title: MVVM and Windows Phone 7 apps
ques:
I am new to Windows Phone 7 development and have a quick question.
Does the MVVM design pattern apply to the Windows Phone 7 platform?

answers.ans:
It sure does.

You can use a MVVM framework such as MVVM Light that has support for WP7
http://www.galasoft.ch/mvvm/getstarted/

You may roll your own as well, here's some links to get you started...
http://babaandthepigman.wordpress.com/2010/05/04/windows-phone-7-mvvm-and-tdd-part-1-introduction/
http://babaandthepigman.wordpress.com/2010/05/04/windows-phone-7-mvvm-and-tdd-part-2-%E2%80%93-the-first-test/
